welcome_messages.title: Hi There!
welcome_messages.message:
I am here to help you stay healthy all day - because YOU MATTER!
Do you want to focus on any particular area today?

welcome_messages.title: Hello Champ!
welcome_messages.message:
All work and no play . . .
Want to tell me where it hurts?

welcome_messages.title: What's Up?
welcome_messages.message:
Today is gonna be a great day :)!
Click the green button below if you'd like some focused attention today.

snooze_messages.title: Snooze One
snooze_messages.message: No problem! I will remind you after 15 mins!

snooze_messages.title: Snooze two
snooze_messages.message: I know you are busy, but you MATTER! why don't you try this quick exercise gif

snooze_messages.title: Snooze three
snooze_messages.message: I am back, how about that break?

reminder.title: DA Care Reminder
reminder.message: Your next break is coming up in 10 minutes, are you ready?
